name: Panic At The Disco
description:
A GMTK Game Jam Submission

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 which lasted for 48h.
The game was made in roughly 20h by myself.
Feel free to use all code and assets for your own Projects. Credits are not needed but welcome.

You can also find the game on itch.io

Theme:
The theme of the game jam was "Out of control"

Overview:
This is a short, fast paced, colorful action game in which you can try to get the HighScore.
Master different challenges in 3 Stages which vary in difficulty and gameplay.

Epilepsy warning:

This game contains many fast flashing lights in different colors.

Source Code:
One can find the source code on GitHub. (Keep in mind; the code has Jam quality)
The code in the zip on itch.io was up to date at the time of writing. To get the latest code, head over to GitHub.
Feel free to use all Code and Assets for your own projects. Credits are not needed but welcome.

Credits:
The Music was generated using EcrettMusic which is a AI Music generator.
The soundtrack for the last Stage was taken from OpenGameArt and was provided by Ville Nousiainen and looped by me.
All other assets were created directly in the Godot Game Engine
